NodeListener
           
OperationListener
          Supports nesting of consequtive graph events, by receiving callbacks when an event starts and when in finishes.
WeakListener
          A graph listener with a corresponing delegate listener (which actually processes all graph events), which does not prevent the latter of being reclaimed by the garbage collector.
